mapper.sql: steamid, appid, achname, achieved, unlocktime, updatetime, extra_varchar, extra_int
mapper.select: select count(DISTINCT appid) from playerach where steamid = #{steamid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) from playerach where steamid = #{steamid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND achieved = 1
select count(*) from playerach where steamid = #{steamid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select DISTINCT appid from playerach where steamid = #{steamid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into playerach (steamid, appid, achname, achieved, unlocktime, updatetime, extra_varchar, extra_int) values (#{steamid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{achname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{achieved,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unlocktime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extraVarchar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extraInt,jdbcType=INTEGER})
